pages.text: I've finally broken the $(thing)Arcane Barrier$() and dropped down into the Beneath.$(br2)It is darker than the abyss down here, and I can feel that every monster in this terrible place has its eyes on me as I enter.

I still need to gather valuable minerals like $(thing)mythril$(), in both its $(thing)arcane$() and $(thing)raw$() forms, and $(thing)viridium$(). I must be careful to not be too greedy or I'll be swamped by more monsters than I can handle.
